price: (Do t’u thuhet) “Hani e pini e ju bëftë mirë, (si shpërblim) për atë që keni punuar.”
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
